name: BlueBridge One Business Solutions
tag_list: netsuite, ondemand-software, saas, software-as-a-service, erp, crm, ecommerce
overview:
As a leading solution provider of ondemand business management software for growing and midsize businesses BlueBridge One specialises in delivering scalable business solutions that accelerate growth and improve productivity. These award-winning software solutions offer all the value and benefits normally associated with integrated business applications previously only affordable by large enterprises.

The fully integrated solutions are based on the NetSuite platform and include: customer relationship management (CRM); order fulfilment, inventory, accounting and finance (ERP), e-commerce and website management. NetSuite is used by over 6000 small and mid-size companies worldwide, it is the first and only solution to give growing and midsize businesses on-demand Web-based business applications to run their entire company.

external_links.title: BlueBridge One is named as EMEA's Top Solution Provider for fourth consecutive year
